eqcorrscan.core.resolution_test module¶

Part of the EQcorrscan package written by Calum Chamberlain of Victoria University of Wellington.

Functions designed to test the reosultion of templat matching cross-correlation function inspired by Emily Warren-Smith.

eqcorrscan.core.resolution_test.ccc_gen(image, template)[source]¶

Function to test if a detection is possible at this moveout

Returns:ccc, a matrix of correlation values
eqcorrscan.core.resolution_test.moveout_check(template, nodes, lags, threshold, thresh_type, lowcut, highcut, filt_order)[source]¶

Function to check different moveouts for detectability
